identity.description:
Provides disease-target association scores from Expression Atlas gene expression data.

Extract disease-target association scores from Expression Atlas. This provides gene expression data.

efoId.description: The EFO (Experimental Factor Ontology) ID of the disease, e.g., 'EFO_0000339' for chronic myelogenous leukemia

pageSize.description: Number of results per page (default: 100, max: 100)

purpose.model:
SentenceTransformer(
  (0): Transformer({'max_seq_length': 4096, 'do_lower_case': False, 'architecture': 'BertModel'})
  (1): Pooling({'word_embedding_dimension': 384, 'pooling_mode_cls_token': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_tokens': True, 'pooling_mode_max_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_sqrt_len_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_weightedmean_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_lasttoken': False, 'include_prompt': True})
  (2): Normalize()
)

domain.model:

  (0): Transformer({'max_seq_length': 4096, 'do_lower_case': False, 'architecture': 'BertModel'})
  (1): Pooling({'word_embedding_dimension': 384, 'pooling_mode_cls_token': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_tokens': True, 'pooling_mode_max_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_sqrt_len_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_weightedmean_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_lasttoken': False, 'include_prompt': True})
  (2): Normalize()
)
